mapper.sql: id, HRV, sbp_ave, dbp_ave, Heartrate, Bloodoxygen, microcirculation, respirationrate,mood phone, imei, createtime
mapper.update:
update jfhealth
HRV = #{HRV,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sbp_ave = #{sbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dbp_ave = #{dbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Heartrate = #{heartrate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Bloodoxygen = #{bloodoxygen,jdbcType=INTEGER},
microcirculation = #{microcirculation,jdbcType=INTEGER},
respirationrate = #{respirationrate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Amedicalreport = #{amedicalreport,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jfhealth set HRV = #{HRV,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sbp_ave = #{sbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dbp_ave = #{dbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Heartrate = #{heartrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Bloodoxygen = #{bloodoxygen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, microcirculation = #{microcirculation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, respirationrate = #{respirationrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Amedicalreport = #{amedicalreport,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jfhealth set HRV = #{HRV,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sbp_ave = #{sbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dbp_ave = #{dbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Heartrate = #{heartrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Bloodoxygen = #{bloodoxygen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, microcirculation = #{microcirculation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, respirationrate = #{respirationrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'year'

select.if: SELECT CASE WHEN TRUNCATE(avg(step_when),0) IS null THEN 0 ELSE TRUNCATE(avg(step_when),0) END AS step_when, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM equipment_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y') = #{timedata} AND user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'

select.if: SELECT CASE WHEN TRUNCATE(avg(step_when),0) IS null THEN 0 ELSE TRUNCATE(avg(step_when),0) END AS step_when, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM equipment_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m') = #{timedata} AND user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d')

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(HRV),0) as HRV,TRUNCATE(avg(sbp_ave),0) as sbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(dbp_ave),0) as dbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(Heartrate),0) as Heartrate, TRUNCATE(avg(Bloodoxygen),0) as Bloodoxygen,TRUNCATE(avg(microcirculation),0) as microcirculation,TRUNCATE(avg(respirationrate),0) as respirationrate, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM jfhealth WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m') = #{timedata} AND phone=#{userId} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(HRV),0) as HRV,TRUNCATE(avg(sbp_ave),0) as sbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(dbp_ave),0) as dbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(Heartrate),0) as Heartrate, TRUNCATE(avg(Bloodoxygen),0) as Bloodoxygen,TRUNCATE(avg(microcirculation),0) as microcirculation,TRUNCATE(avg(respirationrate),0) as respirationrate, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM jfhealth WHERE YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW()) AND phone=#{userId} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'

select.if: SELECT tt.*,new,createtime FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(MAX(sbp_ave),'/',MAX(dbp_ave)) AS max,CONCAT(MIN(sbp_ave),'/',MIN(dbp_ave)) min,COUNT(*) AS count,CONCAT(ROUND(AVG(sbp_ave)),'/',ROUND(AVG(dbp_ave))) as avg,phone FROM jfhealth WHERE phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) )tt INNER JOIN ( SELECT tp.phone,CONCAT(sbp_ave,'/',dbp_ave) as new,date_format(tp.createtime,'%H:%i') as createtime FROM jfhealth tp INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(createtime) as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW())) tt ON tp.createtime=tt.createtime WHERE tp.phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) ) tg ON tt.phone=tg.phone

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'

select.if: SELECT tt.*,new,createtime FROM ( SELECT MAX(heartRate) as max,MIN(heartRate) AS min,COUNT(*) AS count,ROUND(AVG(heartRate)) AS avg,phone FROM jfhealth WHERE phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) )tt INNER JOIN ( SELECT tp.phone,heartRate as new,date_format(tp.createtime,'%H:%i') as createtime FROM jfhealth tp INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(createtime) as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW())) tt ON tp.createtime=tt.createtime WHERE tp.phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) ) tg ON tt.phone=tg.phone

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'

select.if: SELECT tt.*,new,createtime FROM ( SELECT MAX(HRV) as max,MIN(HRV) AS min,COUNT(*) AS count,ROUND(AVG(HRV)) AS avg,phone FROM jfhealth WHERE phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) )tt INNER JOIN ( SELECT tp.phone,HRV as new,date_format(tp.createtime,'%H:%i') as createtime FROM jfhealth tp INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(createtime) as createtime FROM jfhealth WHERE phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW())) tt ON tp.createtime=tt.createtime WHERE tp.phone=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) ) tg ON tt.phone=tg.phone

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'

select.if: SELECT tt.new,tg.createtime,tv.max,tv.maxtime,tj.min,tj.mintime,tt.avg,kilometre FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS new,ROUND(AVG(step_when)) as avg,ROUND(COUNT(*)*50/100000) as kilometre,user_id FROM equipment_data WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) )tt INNER JOIN ( SELECT tp.user_id,date_format(tp.createtime,'%H:%i') as createtime FROM equipment_data tp INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX(createtime) as createtime FROM equipment_data WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW())) tt ON tp.createtime=tt.createtime WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(tp.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) ) tg ON tt.user_id=tg.user_id INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM(step_when) AS max,date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as maxtime,user_id FROM equipment_data WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) GROUP BY date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY step_when DESC LIMIT 0,1 ) tv ON tg.user_id=tv.user_id INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM(step_when) AS min,date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d') as mintime,user_id FROM equipment_data WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND YEARWEEK(date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d')) =YEARWEEK(NOW()) GROUP BY date_format(createtime,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY step_when LIMIT 0,1 ) tj ON tg.user_id= tj.user_id

mapper.select:
select count(*) from jfhealth
where CONCAT(imei) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{_parameter}),'%')

select count(id) from jfhealth where 1=1
and CONCAT(imei) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyWord}),'%')
and createtime LIKE concat(concat('%',#{time}),'%')
and phone LIKE concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%')
and imei in
#{item}

select id,HRV,sbp_ave,dbp_ave,Heartrate,Bloodoxygen,microcirculation,respirationrate,imei,Amedicalreport, createtime,substring(phone,9,10) as phone FROM jfhealth where 1 =1
and CONCAT(imei) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyWord}),'%')
and createtime LIKE concat(concat('%',#{time}),'%')
and phone LIKE concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%')
and imei in
#{item}
order by id desc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM jfhealth where imei=#{imei} ORDER BY createtime desc LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT *FROM jfhealth WHERE phone =#{alias} ORDER BY createtime LIMIT 0,1
